title: Introduction to CORE Energetics /Radical Aliveness
desc: Bob is hosting a two hour Introduction class to  CORE Energetics / Radical Aliveness ? in the new, warm and cozy yoga studio Ganesha Haus Yoga Lounge in Santa Monica.? Come and explore with Bob the Emotions of Money with? CORE Energetics.? Break through mental blocks and experience Your Full Potetial! Core Energetics is a combined mind/body approach which brings to? conscious light ? - that which holds us back from experiencing our fullest potential. Using Core techniques, we will explore the energy of money & focus on what blocks us from being in full alignment with our own abundance, financial freedom & ways of living life from our "highest selves".
